item.title: Streamlit: Overwrite previous value in a loop
item.description: I was recently building a Streamlit app in which I was looping through a stream of values and wanted to only print out the most recent value. In this blog post we’ll learn how to do that. Figure 1. item.title: Streamlit: multiselect - AttributeError: 'numpy.ndarray' object has no attribute 'index'
item.description: In this post we’ll learn how to overcome a problem I encountered while building a small Streamlit application to analyse John Hopkin’s data on the COVID-19 disease. The examples in this post use a CSV file that contains time series data of deaths in each country.
